idea-plugin.name: Komorebi Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Komorebi - Coding in Bioluminescence

Komorebi (Japanese: Sunlight filtering through trees) is a JetBrains IDE theme designed for the modern developer who values cognitive sustainability.

Features

  • Soft, organic, bioluminescent aesthetic - Rejects harsh, high-contrast norms
  • WCAG AAA compliant - Built from the ground up for accessibility
  • Deuteranopia/Protanopia friendly - Color-blind safe palette
  • Reduced eye strain - Perfect for long coding sessions

The Digital Forest

The interface mimics a walk through a deep forest at twilight:

  • The background is a deep, warm charcoal (the forest floor)
  • The code is bioluminescent flora that guides the path

Semantic Joy

  • Keywords (Sakura Pink) - Playful but authoritative
  • Strings (Golden Hour) - Warm and readable
  • Variables (Glacier Blue) - Cool and flowing
  • Methods (Electric Lavender) - Creative and magical
  • Classes (Mint Leaf) - Structure and growth
